snippet: The American aircraft manufacturer Hawker Beechcraft has entered discussions with Superior Aviation Beijing of China to sell itself to the Chinese company for $1.79 billion.
abstract: The American aircraft manufacturer Hawker Beechcraft has entered discussions with Superior Aviation Beijing of China to sell itself to the Chinese company for $1.79 billion.

headline.main: Hawker Beechcraft in Talks With Chinese Firm on $1.79 Billion Deal
